name: Drone Shock (LAN)
description:
Description:

School Project, Games and Multimedia (ESTG-IPLeiria)

Keyboard Controls:

  • Movement: WASD + IJKL
  • Shooting: Left CTRL or MSB1
  • Bombs: Spacebar
  • Scoreboard: TAB

Drone Shock (LAN) made by:

  • Hugo Moreira (Developer and Level Designer), with free online assets
